attributes.action: force Gavin LeBoutillier to have a hair cut and then pass a law banning him from growing it any longer then 5 centimetres.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gavin is a nice lad, but he has foolishly long hair and it needs a trim.  No Amount of persuasion from his work colleagues has had an affect so we call on you, the Prime Minister to intervene and help us all.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
